attributes.action: Stop Benefits for Muslim Hate Preachers
attributes.additional_details:
Some of the Muslim hate preachers are receiving state benefits.
How can spending their days poisoning young minds against the country they live in be classed as looking for work?
If they are somehow on disability benefit, how can they be standing in the street with their megaphones inciting this hatred?
They must stop the preaching and stop getting benefits from the country they obviously hate so much.
